text:
Huawei is preparing a rival iPad Pro, and it is something like
01 Nov 2019, 12:39 by Ilya Sidorov
Insider Evan Blass showed a render of the new Huawei tablet.
The company almost completely copied the design of the front of the iPad Pro. She changed the aspect ratio and set the camera on the screen.
At the back, the Huawei MatePad Pro does not look much like other tablets, which is already pleasing.



A proprietary keyboard and stylus will be available for the device, which is attached to the top of the device. Both gadgets look like the Apple Smart Keyboard Folio and Apple Pencil.
Huawei MatePad Pro does not have a fingerprint scanner on the case. Perhaps the company will install it on the screen or come up with some kind of face recognition technology.


iPad Pro 2018

The Kirin 990 chip with 5G support, 8 GB of RAM and a 256 GB drive will be responsible for the device‚Äôs performance.
In the subject: Xiaomi again for the old. Now they clone the Apple Watch
When Huawei will introduce the tablet, it is unknown. [The Verge]
